label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_011
content:
## 2024-05-13 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 91
- Active: 87
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 26
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 28
- Standard: 32
- Placebo: 31

### Efficacy By Arm
#### Multimodal
- VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.4
- VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 37.0
- Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.2
- Six MWT (meters) Mean: 325.0
- Six MWT (meters) SD: 52.0
- Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.3
- Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.6
- Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.2
- Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 4.2
- Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.4

#### Standard

- VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3

- Six MWT (meters) SD: 32.0

- Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.5

- Sessions Attended: 149
- Attendance Rate (%): 83.7

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1155, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1126, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1170, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1111, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1195, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- No protocol deviations reported.

### Events
- Central pharmacy opioid supply reconciliation completed
- Central pharmacy opioid supply reconciliation completed

### Notes
- Week 11: Pain management assessments on track. 91 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
